App Name: Oxford Dictionary of English

Brief:

The Oxford Dictionary of English stands as a paragon of language reference tools, offering a comprehensive and authoritative dictionary for learners and professionals alike. Embrace the richness of the English language with the latest 2019 database update from the Oxford University Press, boasting over 350,000 words, phrases, and meanings. This app isn't simply a repository of English‚Äîit's a gateway to mastering the living history and versatility of the language.

  • üöÄ Quick Search Tools: Enjoy a seamless search experience with predictive autocomplete, keyword lookup, and camera search üîç.
  • üìñ Learning Tools: Benefit from features like Word of the Day, home screen widget, Favorites option, and offline mode üéì.
  • üîÑ Tap to Translate: Translate words in any app with a simple tap üîÑ.

Crafted to cater to the demanding needs of professionals and academics as well as students and language enthusiasts, the Oxford Dictionary of English infuses your daily study with the depth and precision of an esteemed language research institution. Whether at work, home, or on the go, this dictionary app is an invaluable companion for anyone engaged in the nuanced world of English.
